text: Zhishan is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R17. == Station layout information == The station platforms are above ground level. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. ==Notable Landmarks== * Tianmu Area === Historical Landmarks / Sports === * Chin Shan Yen Gate * Tianmu Baseball Stadium === School === * Taipei American School * Taipei Japanese School * University of Taipei === Shopping Center/Cinemas === * * Shin Kong Mitsukoshi Tianmu Branch * * Fareastern SOGO department store Tianmu Branch Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Zhishan metro station
